thread.title: Where to see the Vulcan bomber farewell tour
thread.title_full: Where to see the Vulcan bomber farewell tour

author: Ben Farmer
title: Where to see the Vulcan bomber farewell tour
text: Aviation Where to see the Vulcan bomber farewell tour The world's last flying Vulcan bomber, XH558, will this weekend perform fly-pasts around the country giving large crowds a chance to say goodbye to the Cold War bomber The last airworthy Avro Vulcan XH558 flying over Doncaster Airport Photo: REX By Ben Farmer , Defence Correspondent 1:55PM BST 08 Oct 2015
